messages.title: A Future Fair For All
messages.content: With the election just days away, I need your support to win in Hampstead & Kilburn. The latest polls show the result here is too close to call, so your vote is crucial. The choice you face is about your future, and the future of your family. I'll fight, as I always have, for a future that's fair for all our people.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Secure our economic recovery, not put it at risk.
Go for growth, by maintaining investment in our people and public services we all need.
Fight for families. I'll protect Sure Start and Child Trust Funds in our community.
Keep our neighbourhoods safe with new guarantees on response times and community policing.
Love our NHS. We'll guarantee one week cancer diagnosis, saving up to 10,000 lives a year.

issues.economy: Secure our economic recovery, not put it at risk.
issues.health: Love our NHS. We'll guarantee one week cancer diagnosis, saving up to 10,000 lives a year.
issues.socialWelfare: Fight for families. I'll protect Sure Start and Child Trust Funds in our community.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have fought ever since to get the best for local people, and I am proud of what we have achieved. Faced with a global recession, we took action which kept people in their jobs and homes, and kept businesses running. Britain is not broken, and I am proud to represent such a diverse and vibrant area. I want to continue to stand up for you and for our community, to do so I need you to vote for me.

politicalExperience.achievements: Fought for local people and achieved action during global recession which kept people in their jobs and homes, and kept businesses running.

quotes.text: Not all politicians are the same

images.caption: Glenda Jackson, Your Labour Candidate for Hampstead & Kilburn.
